High.message: We miss you! Here's ₹200 OFF your next scrap pickup. Use code: BIGSAVE200. Valid for 15 days.
A special offer just for you! Get ₹150 off your next scrap pickup with ScrapUncle. Use code: COMEBACK150.
Thanks for being a valuable customer! Enjoy ₹175 off your next pickup. Use code: HVU175.

Mid.message: Get ₹100 off your next scrap pickup! Use code: SCRAP100 before it expires.
You've unlocked ₹75 savings on your next ScrapUncle pickup! Use code: SAVE75.
Enjoy ₹50 off as a token of our appreciation! Use code: RECYCLE50.

Low.message: Welcome to ScrapUncle! Get 10% extra on your first pickup. Use code: WELCOME10.
Thank you for choosing to recycle with ScrapUncle! Every bit helps.
Thanks for recycling with us! Stay tuned for exciting future offers and rewards.
